## Configuration Changes

- **Updated 4 cron jobs** (Sentinel, Scout, Radar, Scribe) to save reports into `forgerock-learning` repo under `reports/` and auto-push to GitHub
- **Repo moved:** `forgerock-learning` relocated from `~/.openclaw/workspace/forgerock-learning/` to `~/workspace/forgerock-learning/` (symlink left at old path)
- **React Radar timeout diagnosed:** Root cause is missing Brave Search API key on uidev agent + job doing too much in one shot
- **Pixel SRE Digest Update:** New cron job created (3:30 AM daily) to separate SRE digest HTML updates from Atlas's scout job
